body_html: @yaroslavvb I want the diagonal of Hessian but specifically for a smooth network and I want it with respect to inputs not parameters. Second derivative of a piecewise linear function with respect to its input is trivially zero and just for the record Tensorflow returns None even though it must return zero.
body_text: @yaroslavvb I want the diagonal of Hessian but specifically for a smooth network and I want it with respect to inputs not parameters. Second derivative of a piecewise linear function with respect to its input is trivially zero and just for the record Tensorflow returns None even though it must return zero.
body: @yaroslavvb I want the diagonal of Hessian but specifically for a smooth network and I want it with respect to inputs not parameters. Second derivative of a piecewise linear function with respect to its input is trivially zero and just for the record Tensorflow returns `None` even though it must return zero.
